title: FIFA corruption scandal: Blatter, Platini face uphill struggle under scrutiny of appeal panel
text: FIFA's Appeal Committee will never face a bigger task than ruling on the suspensions of Sepp Blatter and the man who has been most likely to succeed him as president, Michel Platini Â»
